document.docAuthor: Pinto, Hudson Alves & Melo, Alan Lane De
document.masterDocTitle: A checklist of cercariae (Trematoda: Digenea) in molluscs from Brazil

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: A checklist of cercariae (Trematoda: Digenea) in molluscs from Brazil

subSubSection.paragraph: Localities: Belo Horizonte, Jaboticatubas, MG. Reference: Ruiz ( 1952 b).

Host:
Ancylus
sp. (Gastropoda: Ancylidae ). Cercarian group: strigeid. Habitat: freshwater.

Hosts:
B . glabrata
,
B . straminea
;
B . tenagophila
,
Biomphalaria
sp.,
Drepanotrema cimex (Moricand)
(Gastropoda: Planorbidae ).
Localities: Belo Horizonte; Caratinga, Matozinhos, Uberlândia, MG; Florianópolis, SC; Guarulhos, Itanhaém, Louveira, Santo André, SP.

References: Ruiz ( 1953 ), Machado & Abreu ( 1955 ), Milward-de-Andrade & Campos ( 1969 ), Artigas et al . ( 1970 ), Espíndola et al . ( 1992 ), Coletto et al . ( 1993 ), Souza et al . ( 1981 ), Souza et al . ( 1998 ), Carvalho et al . ( 2001 b), Moraes et al . ( 2009 ), Eduardo et al . ( 2012 ).

Host:
Pomacea lineata (Spix)
(Gastropoda: Ampullariidae ). Cercarian group: brevifurcate. Habitat: freshwater.
Host: Unionidae (Bivalvia). Cercarian group: strigeid. Habitat: freshwater.

Host:
Gundlachia concentrica
(d'Orbigny) (Gastropoda: Ancylidae ) Cercarian group: strigeid.
Locality: Porto Alegre, RS. Reference: Veitenheimer-Mendes et al . ( 1995 ).

Hosts:
B . peregrina
,
B . tenagophila
. Cercarian group: xiphidiocercaria.

Host:
Drepanotrema depressissimum (Moricand)
(Gastropoda: Planorbidae ). Cercarian group: gymnocephalous.
Localities: undetermined localities, RJ and North region of Brazil . Reference: Lutz ( 1933 ).

Host:
Biomphalaria
sp. Cercarian group: cystophorous. Habitat: freshwater.

Hosts:
B . glabrata
,
B . tenagophila
,
Biomphalaria
sp. Cercarian group: xiphidiocercaria.
Localities: Belo Horizonte, MG; Guarulhos; Santos; São Paulo, SP. References: Ruiz ( 1943 ), Ruiz ( 1952 a, b), Souza et al . ( 1998 ), Moraes et al . ( 2009 ).

Hosts:
B . glabrata
,
B . straminea
,
D . cimex
,
P . marmorata
. Cercarian group: echinostome.

Localities: Belo Horizonte, Jaboticatubas, Matozinhos, MG; Florianópolis, SC. References: Ruiz ( 1952 b), Milward-de-Andrade & Campos ( 1969 ), Souza et al . ( 1981 ), Espíndola et al . ( 1992 ), Souza et al . ( 1998 ).

Host:
Ayalacostoma tuberculata
Wagner (Gastropoda: Thiaridae ). Cercarian group: strigeid.
Localities: Belo Horizonte, Jaboticatubas, MG. References: Ruiz ( 1952 b), Souza et al . ( 1981 ), Souza et al . ( 1998 ).

Host:
Biomphalaria
sp. Cercarian group: strigeid. Habitat: freshwater.

Hosts:
Biomphalaria
sp.,
B . glabrata
,
B . straminea
,
B . tenagophila
. Cercarian group: brevifurcate.

Hosts:
D . anatinum
,
Biomphalaria
sp. Cercarian group: strigeid. Habitat: freshwater.

Host:
Aylacostoma
sp. Cercarian group: echinostome. Habitat: freshwater.
